casebody.data:
Ervin RAINEY, Employee
v.
CITY OF CHARLOTTE, Employer, and Self-insured, Carrier No. 231P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 Vernon Sumwalt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Rainey, Ervin. Mark T. Sumwalt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte. Lauren H. Walker, Attorney at Law. Lawrence J. Goldman, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for City of Charlotte, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 17th of June 2016 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
